snippet: Orb, the Florida Derby winner trained by Shug McGaughey, was made the morning-line favorite at 7-2 odds and will start Saturday’s Kentucky Derby from the No. 16 post.  Verazzano, the 4-1 second choice, drew the No. 14 post.
abstract: Orb, the Florida Derby winner trained by Shug McGaughey, was made the morning-line favorite at 7-2 odds and will start Saturday’s Kentucky Derby from the No. 16 post.  Verazzano, the 4-1 second choice, drew the No. 14 post.

headline.main: Favorites Draw Outside Posts for Derby
